TopicTitle: Yet another Santa sleigh. This one's small though.

Articles.Content:
Isn't Holiday Cheer better when it's Fun-Sized?

Presenting:

The Pico-Sleigh!

Powered by monopropellant and borderline stable, the Pico-Sleigh's diminutive size is just enough for delivering a few small presents and returning home! It features a full eight reindeer, a Semi-Explosive Way of Landing (with optional abort system), and patented Near-VTOL Technology! Oh, and Jeb seems to enjoy it a lot.

Pictures!

Front view. Look at those somewhat-cute, diminutive reindeer!

Top view. Jeb... er... Santa is an excellent pilot. Which is needed, because this thing is unwieldy.

~~~

Video!

Here's my Bagel-Rabbit Holiday Special, which features the craft in flight, though only briefly!

~~~

I don't want to release the .craft file until tomorrow, because I don't want to give out presents early (and the craft is still quite wonky and needs a little more attention), but I hope you enjoyed this thing!

Have a Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays!

-Upsilon
